titles.title: To amend the definition of "State" in the Federal Home Loan Bank Act to include American Samoa within the meaning of such term.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Banking and Financial Services.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Capital Markets, Securities and Government Sponsored Enterprises.

committee.name: House Committee on Banking and Financial Services

committee.subcommittee: Capital Markets, Securities and Government Sponsored Enterprises
committee.name: House Banking and Financial Services

bill.summary: 3/3/1997--Introduced. Amends the Federal Home Loan Bank Act to include American Samoa within the meaning of "State."
